entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
